name: 世界上最美丽的 Milta
greetingText: This is your favorite engineer 惠文
wishText: Do you hear that? That’s me screaming Happy Birthday to my beautiful friend! ;)
textInChatBox: Go bestie, it's your birthday! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are the most Special and Gorgeous girl in the world!!!
outroText: The world is a better place because you’re in it, my bestie!!! I hope you have an amazing birthday!
replayText: If you want to watch it again, click the sentence~
